content: photo b-3 page 5 single_crochet in last 4 sts join = 29 sts and chain-10 loop 4 marbled jellyfish fidget toy © irarott increase 2024 irarott com diagram 2 assembly 10 b-2 b-3 slip_stitch in next st and turn work the next row with the 1 2 back side facing you 3 4 5 row 6 tentacles *chain 16 3 single_crochet in second chain from 6 hook 3 single_crochet in each chain across** skip slip_stitch sl st in next st photos b-5 and b-6 repeat from * to ** slip_stitch in next st repeat from * to ** skip st slip_stitch in next st photo b-6 = 3 tentacles finishing fasten_off and weave in the end when fidgeting simply squeeze the marble from side to side in the body or twist the spirals with your fingers it s a cute little toy that helps with relieving anxiety improving concentration and managing sensory overloads b-4 b-5 all done i hope you had a lot of fun u b-6 5 marbled jellyfish fidget toy © irarott increase 2024 irarott com from the designer terms of use hi i am a canadian
